title: H-1B workers dominate AI-related hiring at Amazon, Google, Meta and more
description: Top technology companies are actively hiring H-1B visa holders to enhance their efforts in artificial intelligence.
content:
H-1B workers are dominating the AI-related hiring at Amazon, Google, Meta, and many other top tech firms. AI-savvy techies are probably going to be the first pick for US companies looking to hire foreigners on H-1B work permits.

title: UN Chief says newly appointed AI panel to provide insights into AI opportunities, impacts
description: UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres expressed his views after the appointment of the members of the Independent International Scientific Panel on Artificial Intelligence (AI) by the General Assembly.
content:
New York [US], February 13 (ANI): UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres expressed his views after the appointment of the members of the Independent International Scientific Panel on Artificial Intelligence (AI) by the General Assembly.

title: Investor concerns over AI Capex returns may grow as Big Tech market leadership weakens: Jefferies
description: The trend of investors questioning returns from artificial intelligence (AI) capital expenditure is expected to grow in the coming quarters as the market leadership of Big Tech in the US stock market shows signs of breaking down, according to a report by Jefferies.

title: Why IT sector is falling: Is AI the catalyst behind the tech rout?
description: Indian IT stocks extended losses after a sharp fall in US-listed ADRs, as fresh advances in artificial intelligence reignited concerns over automation-led disruption in enterprise software and outsourcing models
content:
Indian IT stocks extended their slide on Friday after a sharp overnight correction in US-listed shares reignited fears that rapid advances in artificial intelligence could disrupt the sector’s traditional outsourcing model.
